chezmoi forget --force $HOME${/}.bashrc
! exists ${CHEZMOISOURCEDIR}/dot_bashrc
exists ${CHEZMOISOURCEDIR}/private_dot_ssh
exists ${CHEZMOISOURCEDIR}/private_dot_ssh/config

chezmoi forget --force ${HOME}${/}.ssh
! exists ${CHEZMOISOURCEDIR}/private_dot_ssh

-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/dot_bashrc --
# contents of .bashrc
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/private_dot_ssh/config --
# contents of .ssh/config
